question: Who is the author of the book "Chandra Shekhar - The Last Icon of Ideological Politics"?
explanation: The book titled ‘Chandra Shekhar – The Last Icon of Ideological Politics‘ has been  authored by Rajya Sabha deputy chairman Harivansh and writer Ravi Dutt Bajpai. The book was recently launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi at the Balayogi Auditorium, Parliament Library Building. It chronicles the journey of former PM Chandra Shekhar from his humble lower middle-class background to becoming one of the most prominent political icons of India.
